scripts.dev: mkdir -p dev && npx babel --watch src --out-dir dev --presets react-app/prod & python -m http.server 2020
scripts.build: npx babel src --out-dir . --presets react-app/prod && npx uglifyjs -c -m -o public/index.min.js -- index.js && npx uglifyjs -c -m -o public/login/index.min.js -- login/index.js
